verses.text: Manhxa in gana pitzan in. Ol vak' checlaj in yaelal tic, ol in lolon yed' in k'ak'alk'olal.
Sval d'a Dios, manh tonhejoc tzak'och in mul d'a vib'anh, al d'ayin b'aj ix och in mul chi'.
Ina a ach in a b'onac, ¿tom vach' tzab'i tzin a chaccaneli? Chuc tz'alji d'ayin, axo yed' tas sna eb' chuc spensar tzach ochi.
¿Tom lajan ilan icha quilan a onh anima onh tic?
¿Tom lajan a q'uinal icha jab' quic a onh chamelb'a anima onh tic?
Yuj chi' ¿tas yuj tza say valek' in mul yed' in paltail?
Vach'chom ojtac to malaj in mul, malaj junoc mach syal in scolanel d'a yol a k'ab'.
A ach val ix in a b'o'o, axo ticnaic tza nib'ej tzin a sateli.
Nacoti to d'a lum luum ix in a b'o'o, axo ticnaic, tzin ak'anxicanoch pococal.
Ix a b'o in nivanil tic icha tz'aj sb'o nok' queso ayic spajb'i nok' lech.
A ach ix ak' syamlaj sb'a in b'aquil yed' in ch'anhal. Ix ak'anoch in b'ak'chil yed' in tz'umal d'a spatic.
Ix ak' in q'uinal, ix in a xajanani. Ix in a tanhvej, yuj chi' pitzan in.
Palta axo ticnaic jun, snachajel vuuj to ay tas k'ub'eltac tza na' d'a in patic.
Van in ilani tato tz'och in mul, max in ak' nivank'olal jab'oc yuj in mul chi'.
Tato ay in mul, ob'iltac in. Tato malaj in mul, palta max yal voch d'a ichanh d'a junk'olal, yujto tzin q'uixvi, tzin naancot in yaelal.
Tato svik'chaanh in b'a, satub'tac am tzutej in a sataneli. Icham syutej nok' choj spechan junoc nok' yic schi'a, icha chi' am tzin utej.
Tza say juntzanh testigo d'a in patic. Tzak' val cot oval d'ayin, icha scot nhilnaj eb' soldado yak'an oval.
¿Tas yuj in a chanac aljoc? Comonoc ayic manto in aljoc ix in chamcani, yic malaj mach iljinac in.
Comonoc ayic valjinac d'a in nun, vik'chajnacb'at d'a campusante, ichato malaj mach checlajnac.
Yacb'an to jab'nhej in q'uinal tic, eloc d'a a k'ol tzak'an jab'oc in junk'olal. Eloc d'a a k'ol tzak'an jab'oc in tzalajk'olal,
yic manto in b'at d'a chamub' d'a scal q'uik'alq'uinal b'aj maxtzac yal in paxta. A d'a jun lugar chi', veventac yilji, q'uik'alq'uinal xonhej, manhxalaj jab'oc saquilq'uinal, xchi vinhaj Job chi'.
